summary: This is an email chain between attorneys at WilmerHale and the US Attorney's Office regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case. The emails discuss providing Bates number ranges for JPMorgan account opening documents, coordinating calls about trial witnesses, and the need for a trial appearance subpoena for a JPMorgan witness.

persons.name: Allison Stoddart
persons.context: Attorney from WilmerHale law firm corresponding with the US Attorney's Office about providing JPMorgan account document Bates ranges and coordinating trial witness matters for the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

persons.name: Arian Sahni
persons.context: Attorney at WilmerHale law firm copied on emails regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell case and JPMorgan witness coordination.

persons.name: Anjan Sahni
persons.context: Attorney at WilmerHale law firm (appears to be the same person as Arian Sahni with a typo in the email address) involved in correspondence about the Maxwell case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in criminal case 20 Cr. 330, referenced in the email subject lines and as the subject of the legal proceedings.

persons.name: Maurene
persons.context: Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York corresponding with defense counsel about trial witness matters and subpoenas.

persons.name: Lara
persons.context: Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York copied on emails regarding trial witness coordination.

connections.description: Both are attorneys at WilmerHale law firm working together on the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
Defense attorney (Stoddart) corresponding with prosecutor (Maurene) about trial preparation and witness matters.
Defense attorney corresponding with prosecutor about trial witness coordination.
Attorney from WilmerHale representing defendant Ghislaine Maxwell in criminal case 20 Cr. 330.

events.title: Initial witness discussion
events.description: Prosecutors send draft exhibits to facilitate conversation about identifying an appropriate witness from JPMorgan for the Maxwell trial.

events.title: Subpoena request for JPMorgan witness
events.description: Defense attorney Allison Stoddart requests a trial appearance subpoena for a JPMorgan witness, and prosecutors provide a broadly worded subpoena.

events.title: Call coordination for witness discussion
events.description: Attorneys coordinate a call to discuss trial witness topics for the Maxwell case.

events.title: Account document Bates ranges provided
events.description: Defense attorneys provide Bates number ranges for JPMorgan account opening documents for three accounts, plus onboarding documents for Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: 7 World Trade Center, 250 Greenwich Street, New York, NY 10007
One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document reveals JPMorgan account documents with specific Bates number ranges were being exchanged between defense and prosecution in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
Three specific JPMorgan account numbers are referenced: W23560001, 739474324, and Q79961001, with corresponding Bates ranges provided.
The prosecution was seeking to identify and subpoena a JPMorgan witness for trial testimony in the Maxwell case.
The correspondence shows active coordination between WilmerHale defense attorneys and the US Attorney's Office regarding trial preparation in late 2021.
Ghislaine Maxwell's JPMorgan onboarding documents are referenced with Bates range JPM-SDNY-00002539 to JPM-SDNY-00002570.
